Interest: #texting, #communication, #pixstory, #things to remember, #not to say over text
Narrative:
If I ask You all - What is The easiest Way to communicate These days ?? 🤔

Almond Everyone Of You will say - Texting ! 🥱

Texting has become such an integral part of how we communicate , I often don't think twice about the types of messages i send . Whether it's Sending Wishes , or a description of your day  , texting is typically my go-to form of reaching others . ❤️✅

But one thing i learned is - There are number of things one should never say or do over texts ❌ ! No matter how convenient or easy it may seem . Texting Saves alot of time i agree but there are still certain conversations worth having in person ! ✅

Lemme tell you What things I never say on texts ;

1 Insulting someone 
2 Unexpected Big News or Update 
3 Apologies 
4 Breakups 
5 Secrets 
6 Complaints 
7 Sending passwords
8 sending Unsolicited Sexual Photos
9 Saying "I Love You" For The First Time
10 Announcing Death

Earlier i use to say everything over texts but Then i realised Its Wrong❌ ! I never take risk of wrong person Seeing my texts ! I save the heavier topics for in person ! You know some things were just meant to be said face-to-face . ✅

*Remember*
Texting Is easy But Not everytime it's good ! ✅❤️
Festivals: ['Glasgow International Film Festival 2022', 'Santa Barbara International Film Festival 2022']
Title: A Single Text can Either Make Your day Or can Destroy It completely 🥲
